page.title: 18Our Local Newspaper....Part2
page.content: Local events and entertainment is another area covered by the Bootle Times. The theatre,cinema,concerts, art displays,dancing,jumble-sales and many other social functions are advertised. A great deal of the paper is used in advertising and covers topics such as the best brand of food to buy for your dog or which home-computer offers the best value for your money. New and used cars, all household goods and even houses are advertised for sale. Personal adverts,such as marriage, wedding-anniversaries,births,deaths and birthdays, are also included. Sport completes the contents of the paper.Golf,snooker,darts,cricket, rugby,pigeon-racing,basketball,fishing and many other sports are covered. Football seems to be the most popular sport in our area.
